name: JobManager Implementation
details: Implemented Job model with status tracking
Created JobStore interface and implementations
Developed JobManager class with lifecycle management
Added comprehensive testing
Created documentation and examples

name: Job dependencies
details: Implement job dependency tracking and batch operations
Added dependency management to Job model
Updated SQLAlchemyJobStore to support dependencies
Enhanced JobManager with dependency control methods
Created examples showing dependency patterns and batch operations
Updated documentation with dependency usage

name: Execution control
details: Implemented retry policies for failed jobs
Added fixed delay and exponential backoff strategies
Created distributed execution with workers
Developed worker registration and heartbeat monitoring
Implemented job claiming with tag-based routing
Added concurrent job execution support
Updated documentation with execution control features

name: Monitoring and Observability
details: Implemented event system for job state notifications
Created event emitter with synchronous and asynchronous handlers
Developed comprehensive metrics collection for jobs, workers, and system
Built FastAPI-based REST API for monitoring data
Integrated event emission throughout JobManager and Worker components
Added documentation in README.md and dedicated documentation page
Created example demonstrating event handlers and monitoring API
